verses.name: Luke 22:55
verses.text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall, and were set down together, Peter sat down among them.

verses.name: Luke 22:56
verses.text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire, and earnestly looked upon him, and said, This man was also with him.

verses.name: Luke 22:57
verses.text: And he denied him, saying, Woman, I know him not.

verses.name: Luke 22:58
verses.text: And after a little while another saw him, and said, Thou art also of them. And Peter said, Man, I am not.
